forehand_push.probleme: Should I develop my forehand push?

debutant.description: Push against short backspin to the forehand, using various variations (angles, heavy spin, etc.)

exercices_complementaires.description: Start with a partner serving short to your forehand; push quick off the bounce, then continue the drill/rally with other shots

exercices_complementaires.nom: push and loop forehand to backhand
exercices_complementaires.description: Push short to your partner's backhand; he loops off the push, then you loop off his shot
